author: dwoods
msg: include new Gensis 1.6-SNAPSHOT to fix searching Apache Snapshot Repo twice (apache.snapshots and apache-snapshots) and remove default inclusion of codehuas-snapshots.  This removes 2 extra repo searches for depends.  The codehaus-snapshots and java.net repos were moved into the artifact builds were they are needed (for Selenium depends and JAX depends in JAXWS.)
